elements.title: Farm Aljezur - cork oaks, arable crop, water
elements.contents:
€ 420.000
Farm Aljezur - cork oaks, arable crop, water
prev
next
120m²  31.620m²REF PV-T-589

Sale
3.16 hectare property located 3 km from the center of Aljezur and 7 km from the beaches. It has a construction area of 120sqm corresponding to an old house for reconstruction, classified as a legal ruin, thus offering several possibilities for renovation. The land is of mixed nature, with areas of arable culture and cork oaks. It has easy road access, connection to the electricity grid and on-site water supply. Ideal for those who want to develop a residential project, in an area with great potential.

elements.title: House 2 bedrooms Luxury under construction Monte Clérigo Aljezur - swimming pool, underfloor heating, air conditioning, solar panels, terraces, terrace
elements.contents:
€ 648.944
House 2 bedrooms Luxury under construction Monte Clérigo Aljezur - swimming pool, underfloor heating, air conditioning, solar panels, terraces, terrace
prev
next
142,70m²REF PV-T-576 3B

Sale
An architectural project under construction on the Costa Vicentina, which offers views of the ocean and a unique integration with nature. Each home has been meticulously planned for energy efficiency, including underfloor heating, solar panels and an A energy rating. The interiors feature high-quality finishes such as thin-framed aluminum windows, luxury ceramic floors and pre-installed air conditioning systems. These exclusive residences offer a privileged location, providing a panoramic view of the sea, perfect for the surfer or nature lover. The building follows the level of the land, with all floors, including the roof with a 29sqm terrace, harmoniously integrating into the characteristic landscape of the Costa Vicentina. The interiors were carefully designed to provide maximum comfort and lifestyle . On the 1st floor, there is a spacious living area with direct access to a private terrace. On Floor -1, the kitchen and dining room, both with access to terraces and an outdoor patio ideal for enjoying meals al fresco. The lower floor houses an entertainment room that opens onto the terrace and pool, accompanied by a bathroom and additional storage. Furthermore, these homes are equipped with underfloor heating, solar panels and a heat pump for greater comfort and energy efficiency.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

elements.title: Hotel Aljezur - laundry
elements.contents:
€ 550.000
Hotel Aljezur - laundry
prev
next
78.000m²REF T-584

Sale
Located in a beautiful area with easy access, approximately 8 km from Aljezur, this property is ideal for a nature retreat. It has prior approval for the construction of a resort-style hotel with dispersed units, comprising: 20 buildings, of which 15 are accommodation units/houses with a total area of ​​675sqm (45sqm/unit); 3 buildings for staff accommodation with a total area of ​​120sqm; 1 building for common areas and services with 400sqm; 1 building for laundry, technical area and storage with 150sqm. The project also includes a biological swimming pool, solar park and parking. Areas can be adjusted according to a new plan. The property has a wide variety of trees. Water is supplied via the public network and a borehole, and electricity and telecommunications are located close to the property. It is approximately 15 minutes from the beaches of Vale dos Homens and Amoreira, a 40-minute drive from Palmares Golf Course and approximately 90 minutes by car from Faro Airport.

elements.title: House 1 bedrooms in the center Aljezur - garden
elements.contents:
€ 248.000
House 1 bedrooms in the center Aljezur - garden
prev
next
Sold
86,70m²REF PV-M-586

Sale
Located in the Historic Center of the picturesque village of Aljezur, it offers a view over the River and the Várzea. The house has one bedroom, a kitchen, a living room, two bathrooms, a mezzanine, a storage room and a patio. The garden has great sun exposure and landscape. Access to local shops is convenient, as the market, bakeries, cafes, restaurants, banks and other essential amenities are just a few steps away. The house is just 10 minutes from the region's beautiful beaches, 30 minutes from the Lakes and 90 minutes from Faro Airport. Schedule your visit now!

prev

100m²  140m²REF PV-T-573

Sale
Located in the Historic Center of the picturesque Village of Aljezur, it offers a view over the River and the Várzea. On the ground floor, we find the easily accessible garage, various storage spaces, a private backyard with 22sqm, bedroom and bathroom. The upper floor has a living room, a kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom, an 8sqm terrace and a 3sqm balcony with great sun exposure and landscape. Access to the local market is convenient and abundant. Furthermore, it has the potential to use the garage space as a place for commerce.

elements.title: Farm Casa Vicentina Odeceixe Aljezur - swimming pool, garden
elements.contents:
€ 2.500.000
Farm Casa Vicentina Odeceixe Aljezur - swimming pool, garden
prev
next
778m²  165.480m²REF PV-T-575

Sale
Casa Vicentina -Tourism in Rural Space is a Charming Property. It has 3 distinct buildings, providing a welcoming and comfortable environment for guests. One of them consists of 4 T1 Apartments with Mezzanine, in the second we have 2 T1, the cafeteria and warehouse with laundry and finally the third building with 1 T1 and 6 Suites. The relaxing pool, strategically located in the center of the buildings , is easily accessible to guests. The well-maintained garden, along with the natural beauty, provides a peaceful environment to enjoy moments of leisure and rest. Water coming from the Borehole and the Irrigation Canal. Solar and Photovoltaic panels.
